channel.title: Bernalillo County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Bernalillo County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 181
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 181 - NM-217/Sedillo.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 178
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 178 - Zuzax.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 175
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 175 - NM-14/NM-333/NM-337/Tijeras/Cedar Crest. Use NM-14 for the Turquoise Trail National Scenic Byway and the Sandia Crest Ski Area.

item.title: NM-14 North at NM-306/NM-536
item.description: NM-14 north at NM-536 west to Sandia Crest Ski Area. Turn right for NM-306, Frost Road. Entering the community of San Antonito.

item.title: NM-14 North - National Scenic Byway
item.description: NM-14 north National Scenic Byway and New Mexico Scenic Byway sign. This is the start of the Turquoise Trail.

item.title: NM-14 at NM-333/NM-337
item.description: NM-14/NM-333/NM-337 junction. Use left lane for NM-14 North/Cedar Crest/East Tijeras.

item.title: I-40 East Exit 175 Offramp
item.description: I-40 East Exit 175 offramp. Use left lane for NM-14 north to Cedar Crest. Use right lane for NM-337/NM-333 to Tijeras.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 175
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 175 - NM-14/NM-333/NM-337/Tijeras/Cedar Crest. Use NM-14 for the Turquoise Trail National Scenic Byway and the Sandia Crest Ski Area.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 170
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 170 - Carnuel.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 224B Frontage Road
item.description: I-25 South on Exit 224B Frontage Road (Locust St). Turn right for Downtown Albuquerque (Dr. Martin Luther King Jr Blvd.). Continue straight for I-25 South and the University of New Mexico (via Central Ave.).

item.title: I-40 West - Exits 159B and 159C
item.description: I-40 west at Exits 159B and 159C. Use Exit 159B for I-25 South to Las Cruces; Exit 159C for I-25 north to Santa Fe.

item.title: I-40 West - Exits 159B-D
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 159D - University Blvd./2nd-4th St./LOCAL TRAFFIC. Exit 159C - I-25 North/Santa Fe. Exit 159B - I-25 South/Las Cruces. Continue west on I-40 for Gallup.

item.title: I-40 West Approaching Exits 159B-D
item.description: I-40 west approaching Exit 159D - University Blvd./2nd-4th St./LOCAL TRAFFIC; Exit 159BC - I-25/Santa Fe/Las Cruces.

item.title: I-40 West - Exit 160
item.description: I-40 west at Exit 160 - Carlisle Blvd.

item.title: Eubank Blvd. South Approaching I-40
item.description: Eubank Blvd. South approaching I-40 (Exit 165). Use right lane for I-40 west; left lanes for I-40 east.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 167
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 167 - NM-556/Tramway Blvd.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 160
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 160 - Juan Tabo Blvd.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 165
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 165 - Eubank Blvd.

item.title: I-40 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-40 east in Albuquerque. Distance to: Santa Rosa, Tucumcari, Amarillo (Texas).

item.description: I-40 east at Exit 164 - Wyoming Blvd.

item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 161 - San Mateo Blvd.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 160
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 160 - Carlisle Blvd.

item.title: I-40 East - Exits 159CB. Approaching Exit 160.
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 159B - I-25 South/Las Cruces and Exit 159C - I-25 North/Santa Fe. Approaching Exit 160 - Carlisle Blvd.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exits 159C-B
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 159B - I-25 South/Las Cruces and Exit 159C - I-25 North/Santa Fe.

item.title: I-40 East - Exits 159 A-C
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 159A - 4th-2nd St./University Blvd. Approaching Exit 159BC - I-25/Las Cruces/Santa Fe. Continue east on I-40 east to Santa Rosa.

item.title: I-40 East - Exits 157B, 158, 159A
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 157B - 12th St. Approaching Exit 158 - 8th St./6th St. Also approaching Exit 159A - 4th St. - 2nd St./University Blvd.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 157B
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 157B - 12th St.

item.description: I-40 east at Exit 157A - Rio Grande Blvd.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 157A
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 157A - Rio Grande Blvd.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exits 157A-B
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 157A - Rio Grande Blvd. and Exit 157B - 12th St. Also approaching I-25 junction in 3 miles.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 155
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 155 - Coors Blvd.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 154
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 154 - Unser Blvd.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 153
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 153 - 98th St./Arroyo Vista Blvd.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 149
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 149 - NM-500/Atrisco Vista Blvd.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 149
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 149 - NM-500/Atrisco Vista Blvd. Use Exit 149 to follow the route of historic US-66 into downtown Albuquerque via Central Ave.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 140
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 140 - Rio Puerco.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 234
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 234 - NM-556/Tramway Road/Roy Ave. This is the last exit in Albuquerque on I-25 north. Use NM-556 east for the Sandia Peak Tramway. Continue north on I-25 for Santa Fe.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 233
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 233 - NM-528/Alameda Blvd.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 232
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 232 - NM-423/Paseo del Norte. Continue north on I-25 for Santa Fe.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 231
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 231 - San Antonio Drive/Ellison Road.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 230
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 230 - San Mateo Blvd./Osuna Road.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 229
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 229 - Jefferson Street.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 228
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 228 - Montgomery Blvd./Montaño Road.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 227
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 227 - Comanche Road/Griegos Road.

item.title: I-25 North - Exits 226A and B
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 226A - I-40 East/Santa Rosa. Exit 226B - I-40 West/Gallup. Continue north on I-25 for Santa Fe.

item.title: I-25 North - Exits 226A and B
item.description: I-25 North approaching Exit 226A - I-40 East/Santa Rosa. Also approaching Exit 226B - I-40 West/Gallup. I-25 continues north towards Santa Fe.

item.title: I-25 North - Exits 225 and 226AB
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 225 - Lomas Blvd./Menaul Blvd./Candelaria Road./LOCAL TRAFFIC. Approaching Exits 226AB - I-40/Gallup/Santa Rosa. Continue north on I-25 for Santa Fe.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 224B
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 224B - Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. Ave.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 224A
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 224A - Coal Ave./Lead Ave./Central Ave./Historic US-66.

item.title: I-25 North - Exits 225 and 226AB
item.description: I-25 north approaching Exit 225 - Lomas Blvd./Menaul Blvd./Candelaria Road/LOCAL TRAFFIC. Also approaching Exits 226AB - I-40/Gallup/Santa Rosa.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 223
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 223 - Avenida Cesar Chavez.

item.title: Sunport Blvd. West Approaching I-25
item.description: Sunport Blvd. West approaching I-25. Use right lanes for I-25 North/(To)I-40/Downtown (Albuquerque)/Santa Fe. Use left lanes for I-25 South/Las Cruces.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 209
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 209 - NM-317/Isleta Pueblo.
